page.title: 20Nether Stowey:Group Activity
page.content:
This area caters for a wide age spread. Some groups use the village hall, others the new school. The inns are used, and the church has its own meeting place.There are church groups; concerts in the church; an active Women's Institute;choirs;Good Neighbours;Red Cross; British Legion; Old People's Club;Carnival Club. There is an Art group; Square Dancing; Yoga;Keep Fit;and Badminton. Darts and skittles are played at the local inns. There is a football team and cricket team. For the children there are Cubs, Brownies and Guides, and occasionally discotheques and parties at the village hall. The village has a children's playground.
{THIS TEXT PRODUCED BY CHILDREN & STAFF {OF NETHER STOWEY VC PRIMARY SCHOOL {FROM INFORMATION SUPPLIED BY VILLAGERS
